title: Grilled aubergines with miso
description: This aubergine recipe is healthy and low fat, yet absolutely delicious! Serve with rice for a filling midweek meal.
ingredients: 2 Japanese aubergines or 1 large purple aubergine
4 tbsp light (sweet) miso paste (available in some supermarkets and in Asian grocers)
1 tbsp shoyu or light soy sauce
